plurals.name: show_dev_countdown
plurals.item: You are now %1$d steps away from being a developer.
You are now %1$d step away from being a developer.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d letters.
Password must contain at least 1 letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d lower-case letters.
Password must contain at least 1 lower-case letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d upper-case letters.
Password must contain at least 1 upper-case letter.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d numerical digits.
Password must contain at least 1 numerical digit.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d special symbols.
Password must contain at least 1 special symbol.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain at least %d non-letter characters.
Password must contain at least 1 non-letter character.

plurals.name: manage_notification_access_summary_nonzero
plurals.item: %d apps can read notifications
%d app can read notifications

plurals.name: wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code, you have %d remaining attempt/s.
Incorrect SIM PIN code; you have %d remaining attempt/s before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: print_search_result_count_utterance
plurals.item: %1$s printers found
